list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a category of people or things having common characteristics.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: this type of heather grows better in a drier habitat
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Loại Heather này phát triển tốt hơn trong một môi trường sống khô hơn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person or thing symbolizing or exemplifying the ideal or defining characteristics of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she characterized his witty sayings as the type of modern wisdom
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô đặc trưng những câu nói dí dỏm của mình là kiểu Trí tuệ hiện đại

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a design on either side of a medal or coin.
an abstract category or class of linguistic item or unit, as distinct from actual occurrences in speech or writing.
write (something) on a typewriter or computer by pressing the keys.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he typed out the second draft
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông gõ dự thảo thứ hai

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: determine the type to which (a person or their blood or tissue) belongs.
(forming adjectives) resembling or having the characteristics of a specified thing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Kính thiên văn radio kiểu bát đĩa
